game.title: The Lost Temple
game.objective: Retrieve the ancient artifact from the lost temple.
game.description: The temple has been sealed for centuries, but rumors say that it holds a powerful relic. Find and retrieve it before rival treasure hunters do.
game.reward: 10 gold pieces, a magical amulet, and increased reputation
game.quest_giver: Ranger Sophia at the Oakwood Inn

tasks.objective: Locate the entrance to the lost temple
tasks.description: The temple is hidden deep in the forest. Follow the path and find the entrance.
tasks.location: Forest of Elvendom, near the ancient oak tree

tasks.objective: Navigate the temple's traps and puzzles
tasks.description: Use your wits to overcome the obstacles and reach the artifact chamber.
tasks.location: The lost temple, various locations within

tasks.description: Carefully take the artifact from its pedestal. Be cautious, as the temple may not give it up easily.
tasks.location: The artifact chamber, deep within the temple
